verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Wonderful so wonderful newline Is your unfailing love newline Your cross has spoken mercy over me newline No eye has seen no ear has heard newline No heart could fully know newline How Glorious, How Beautiful You are

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Beautiful One I love you newline Beautiful One I adore newline Beautiful One my soul must sing

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Powerful so Powerful newline You're glory fills the skies newline You're mighty works displayed for all to see newline The beauty of your majesty newline Awakes my heart to sing newline How marvelous, How wonderful you are

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: You opened my eyes to your wonders anew newline You captured my heart with this love newline Because nothing on Earth is all beautiful as you

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: My soul my soul must sing newline My soul my soul must sing newline My soul my soul must sing newline Beautiful One
